entry.title: Guy Fieri and Sammy Hagar's Tequila Brand Launches NFT Loyalty Program
entry.summary: The celebrity stars’ Santo Spirits Club will reward users with “mystery” NFTs alongside real-world rewards.

entry.title: XRP Jumps After Unsealing of Highly-Anticipated Hinman Documents
entry.summary: As the Hinman documents, referring to a speech from a former director, are finally released, the price of the XRP token has soared.

entry.title: Uniswap Update Means 'The Possibilities Are Pretty Endless,' Says Developer
entry.summary: The platform has announced its fourth version, open sourcing the draft core code for others to build upon.

entry.title: What Is Sui? The Latest 'Solana Killer' From Former Diem Devs
entry.summary: Sui sets itself apart from other Layer 1 chains with its focus on instant transaction finality, reduced latency in smart contract deployment, and overall transaction speed.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Rise as Inflation Eases to 4% in May
entry.summary: The Federal Reserve is watching, with a key meeting later this week.

entry.title: Arianee's Key Focus for Big Brands? Building 'a Better NFT', Says CEO
entry.summary: NFTs are becoming more dynamic, letting brands join Web3 to integrate their digital assets into their marketing stack, said Arianee’s CEO.

entry.title: Crypto Earn Platform Haru Invest Freezes Withdrawals, Citing Service Partner Issue
entry.summary: The South Korea-based crypto earn platform Haru has halted withdrawals for a reported 80,000 users across 140 countries.

entry.title: 'Tokenization Was Not Created to Evade Laws': Ava Labs CEO
entry.summary: Crypto stalwart Emin Gün Sirer will come up in defense of blockchain technologies at today’s testimony before the House Financial Services Committee.

entry.title: SUI Leads Crypto Market Recovery With 8% Rise Overnight
entry.summary: Thanks to a recent project update and a few contrarian bets in the futures market, the token powering Sui has led the latest rally.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.

entry.title: Metaverse Beauty Week Aims to Showcase the Branding Potential of the Metaverse
entry.summary: Immersive games and events across Decentraland, Spatial, and Roblox this week will invite users to experience cosmetic brands in new ways.

entry.title: Binance Fights Back Against SEC Lawsuit Over Alleged Securities Violations
entry.summary: The cryptocurrency exchange filed more than 20 motions and declarations late Monday.

entry.title: Rishi Sunak’s £100 Million Plan to Make the UK an AI Hub
entry.summary: The Prime Minister wants early access to OpenAI and Google’s new LLMs “for safety purposes.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Hype Lures Meme Token Traders Into Wallet Drainer Attack
entry.summary: A convincing-looking BRC-20 token mint on Friday apparently swiped some $63,000 worth of Bitcoin from unsuspecting traders.

entry.title: Another Solo Bitcoin Miner Hits the Jackpot for $160,000
entry.summary: Beating one-to-5,500 odds, the miner solved a block by renting six-year-old hardware.

entry.title: Crypto-Friendly Congressmen Draft Bill to Reform SEC, Fire Gary Gensler
entry.summary: The congressman aims to decentralize the structure of the SEC, and free the agency from its "tyrannical Chairman."

entry.title: eToro to Halt Polygon, Algorand, Decentraland, and Dash Purchases for US Customers
entry.summary: The move follows a similar pull-back from stock and crypto trading app Robinhood.

entry.title: Reddit’s Crypto Communities Go Dark In Support of Protest Against API Changes
entry.summary: Crypto Twitter, meanwhile, carried on as usual.

entry.title: Binance US Lawyers Up, Braces for Looming Federal Charges
entry.summary: The American arm of the exchange giant is arming itself with top talent—including an ex-SEC attorney.

entry.title: UN Warns of AI-Generated Deepfakes Fueling Hate and Misinformation Online
entry.summary: The United Nations expressed particular concern over the role of AI-generated deepfakes in conflict zones.

entry.title: AI Learning From AI is The Beginning of the End for AI Models
entry.summary: The generative AI machine is so ravenous for content, it may consume more AI-generated material.

entry.title: Binance US Market Shrinks 78% in Just 7 Days After SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Liquidity on Binance's American exchange has dropped since its regulatory woes began last week.

entry.title: Binance Suspends a Dozen Ethereum, BNB Token Trading Pairs
entry.summary: Binance ended trading for more than a dozen pairs including its native BNB token, the defunct Binance USD (BUSD) stablecoin, and five involving ETH.

entry.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming
entry.summary: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.

entry.title: Investors Have Pulled $417M Out of Crypto Funds in Two Months
entry.summary: “Currently there is no end in sight to interest rates rises," James Butterfill, head of research at CoinShares, writes in the new report.

entry.title: Linda Dounia's IN/Visible NFT Exhibition Highlights Black Artists, AI's ‘Skewed’ Lens
entry.summary: The exhibition on Feral File explores “the biases of AI, the biases of the internet, and the biases inherent in Western art history.”

entry.title: BitGo’s Lawsuit Against Galaxy Digital Over $1.2B Merger Dismissed
entry.summary: Galaxy said it was “pleased” at the dismissal of the $100m lawsuit, after the merger between the companies was called off last year.

entry.title: What Is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO)?
entry.summary: DAOs use smart contracts and governance tokens to enable participants to make consensus decisions on how the organization's resources are allocated.

entry.title: How to Launch a DAO
entry.summary: Here's a beginner's guide to the tools and apps you need to start a Decentralized Autonomous Organization.

entry.title: Bitcoin ‘Antifragile’ to Regulatory Pressures: Blockstream CEO Adam Back
entry.summary: The Blockstream co-founder told Decrypt that the U.S. crypto crackdown won’t have far-reaching consequences for Bitcoin traders.

entry.title: DeFi Lending Protocol Sturdy Finance Hit By Exploit, Over $750K Drained
entry.summary: The DeFi platform’s team is trying to communicate with the attackers as its stolen ETH is moved through Tornado Cash.

entry.title: Lummis Renews Commitment to US Crypto Regulation: ‘The Fight is Far From Over’
entry.summary: The Senator said to ‘stay tuned’ for more on her efforts to establish a regulatory framework for the crypto sector in the U.S.

entry.title: Thirdweb Plots Web3 Gaming Push With Ex-Facebook Exec Hire
entry.summary: The infrastructure firm has added Atif Khan to lead its gaming charge, and recently created the game Web3 Warriors on Base.

entry.title: Winklevoss Twins Say 'War On Crypto' Will Hurt Democrats
entry.summary: The billionaire co-founders of Gemini say that “crypto has already won the hearts and minds of Millennials and GenZ."

entry.title: Andreessen Horowitz Opening Crypto Office in London
entry.summary: Citing "a clear regulatory regime" in the UK, a16z crypto sets up shop outside the United States.

entry.title: Gensyn AI Secures $43M for Decentralized Machine Learning Led by a16z
entry.summary: The UK-based startup aims to democratize machine learning and AI development.

entry.title: Solana, Cardano, Polygon Push Back Against SEC 'Security' Label
entry.summary: Although all disagreed, each organization tied to the trio of tokens show varying levels of conviction.

entry.title: Algorand and Flow Crash to All-Time Lows Following SEC Lawsuits
entry.summary: Prices for a number of altcoins fell after they were namechecked by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Outrage Over the SEC Crypto Crackdown
entry.summary: Between bombshell lawsuits against two crypto titans and talk of a weekend Bitcoin dump, it's been a wild ride.

entry.title: Court Finds a 'DAO Is a Person,' Owes $643,542 in Shutdown Order
entry.summary: The CFTC touts the "wake-up call to anyone who believes they can circumvent the law by adopting a DAO structure."

entry.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP
entry.summary: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.

entry.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
entry.summary: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.

entry.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth
entry.summary: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.

entry.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset
entry.summary: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.

entry.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil
entry.summary: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel
entry.summary: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.

entry.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Superfan Base’: SuperDuper Co-founder
entry.summary: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand SuperDuper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.

entry.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs
entry.summary: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.

entry.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
entry.summary: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.

entry.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto
entry.summary: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.

entry.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan
entry.summary: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development
entry.summary: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.

entry.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?
entry.summary: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.

entry.title: You 'Have' to Be on Mobile: InfiniGods Cofounders on Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue share their stance on why mobile gaming is essential to Web3 adoption and general success in the video games industry.

entry.title: Crypto Chaos of 2022 'Didn't Damage Technology Underlying the Industry': X Ventures Co-Founder Matthias Reiser
entry.summary: Ahead of this month's Proof of Talk event in Paris on June 14 and June 15, X Ventures co-founder and the event's co-organizer Dr. Matthias Reiser said nothing's changed for those with a "long-term view" of the industry. Still, events like the collapse of Terra and FTX in 20222 have certainly damaged investors' trust in crypto.

entry.title: Tron's Justin Sun Thinks Hong Kong Will Be a Big Fiat Onramp for Crypto
entry.summary: Justin Sun, Tron founder and advisor to crypto exchange Huobi, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott about the impact of Hong Kong allowing residents to trade crypto, complications of restricting access based on location, and how AI will change the industry.
